instruction: The information are mixed in one field. Help me split them and fill in the columns of First Name, Last Name and Rank

minimal: `TYPING` the "First Name", "Last Name", and "Rank" based on the mixed data in the first cell.
`CLICK` on the cell below the first typed row under "First Name".
`HOTKEY` Ctrl + E to Flash Fill the remaining rows.
`CLICK` on the cell below the first typed row under "Last Name".
`HOTKEY` Ctrl + E to Flash Fill the remaining rows.
`CLICK` on the cell below the first typed row under "Rank".
`HOTKEY` Ctrl + E to Flash Fill the remaining rows.
